 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Trafficker in the Lobby
2.plot: Kevin's newest advocate and sex trafficking survivor, Lexie, is tested in her first intervention with a very suspicious prostitute. The team must help a "bottom girl" get out of the life for good before her agitated pimp decides he can't wait outside anymore.

3.title: Gorilla Pimped
3.plot: Kevin and Lexie are desperate to help a kidnapping victim escape the grasp of her "gorilla pimp" before she disappears forever. Meanwhile the team thinks the mission might be over when they have a frightening, up-close encounter with a trafficker seeking revenge.

4.title: Couple Calls
4.plot: After setting up in a new hotel, Kevin and his team meet a woman who specializes in couples and a student whose work in the life is jeopardizing her goal of becoming a doctor. When one woman questions the set up of the room, the team fears their mission might be compromised forever.

5.title: Two for None
5.plot: Kevin and D'Lita encounter a "2 girl date" where one of the girls is controlled by her deep addiction to heroin. An intervention goes awry when a woman discovers Kevin is wearing a wire. Can the team convince her that he's not a cop before they lose the chance to get her the help she needs?

-1.title: Welcome to Houston
-1.plot: Kevin and his team of volunteers allow cameras to follow them for the first time as they set up in Houston, TX. With former sex victims of trafficking there to help, Kevin poses as a "John" to call women they identify as possible victims of sex trafficking to a hotel room. Based on Kevin's experience as a police officer, the team believes that after eight minutes the chances of a violent interaction with a pimp increase exponentially. The clock is ticking as they offer help that could change these women's lives forever.

imdb.plot outline: "8 Minutes" follows Pastor Kevin Brown and his Lives Worth Saving team as they help sex workers and victims of sex trafficking leave their dangerous situations behind to start over. With over 20 years of law enforcement experience, Brown has determined that eight minutes is the maximum amount of time to safely convince these women to leave with his team - any longer puts everyone's lives at risk. This high-stakes series takes an unflinching look at a very dangerous world.
imdb.title: 8 Minutes
plot: A former cop, Pastor Kevin Brown now tries to intervene in the lives of the victims of sex-trafficking with the help of other victims.::JTP

"_8 Minutes_ (qv)" follows Pastor Kevin Brown and his Lives Worth Saving team as they help sex workers and victims of sex trafficking leave their dangerous situations behind to start over. With over 20 years of law enforcement experience, Brown has determined that eight minutes is the maximum amount of time to safely convince these women to leave with his team - any longer puts everyone's lives at risk. This high-stakes series takes an unflinching look at a very dangerous world.::Jade Turner
